snippet: The former state senator is accused of stealing hundreds of thousands of dollars from the nonprofit organization that he founded and ran, Soundview Health Center in the Bronx.
abstract: Defense delivers closing arguments to federal jury in embezzlement trial of former New York State Senator Pedro Espada Jr, who is accused of stealing hundreds of thousands of dollars from nonprofit Soundview Health Center in the Bronx.

headline.main: Espada’s Lawyer Calls Embezzlement Charges ‘Rotten to the Core’

snippet: Two comprehensive language courses for mobile devices are vastly better in quality than apps that offer a small piece of the language learning experience.

snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a recommendation for customizing the new Gmail, looking ahead to Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference in J...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a recommendation for customizing the new Gmail, looking ahead to Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference in June and the entrepreneurial culture of Stanford University.

snippet: A Queen Anne in Idaho, a condo in Boston and a cottage in Key West.

At January's Consumer Electronics Show, one of the largest tech conventions, computer makers were relentlessly showcasing their ultrabooks - thin and lightweight laptops similar to Apple's MacBook Air. Three months later, you'd be lucky to even se...
abstract: At January's Consumer Electronics Show, one of the largest tech conventions, computer makers were relentlessly showcasing their ultrabooks - thin and lightweight laptops similar to Apple's MacBook Air. Three months later, you'd be lucky to even see an ultrabook in the wild.
